name: Web Microsoft Office
description: Microsoft Office Online is a collaborative working platform of office documents. It allows user to create/edit/share doc/excel/ppt by Office Open XML format to share with others and collaborate.

en_US.description: Microsoft Office Online is a collaborative working platform of office documents. It allows user to create/edit/share doc/excel/ppt by Office Open XML format to share with others and collaborate.
en_US.name: Web Microsoft Office

zh_CN.description: Microsoft Office Online是一个办公文档协同工作平台，它可以让用户通过Office Open XML格式在线创建、编辑和共享文档、电子表格和演示文稿，同时也支持用户使用本地Office程序与他人协同处理Office文件。
zh_CN.name: Microsoft Office 网页版
